attributes.action: Make it so when you turn 16 you do the cbt so thats it's the only bike test todo
attributes.background: As a 19 year old I've done my cbt and I have been riding for over a year and I've bought a new bike but I now need to do my next test, I don't think it's right for me to have to give more money to people who will take me through pretty much the same thing as I did with my cbt.
